body.name: Heavy Duty Commercial Industrial Mop for Floor Cleaning,Beyoco String Wet Mop with Long Handle,Cotton Mop for Home,Garage,Office, Workshop Floor Cleaning- Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 5 mins
features: ✔ 〖Industrial Grade Mop〗Our string wet mop with 60 inch long handle and 1 x large size mop heads is a perfect for commercial and home floor cleaning jobs.

✔ 〖Cotton Mop Head 〗Our heavy duty mop industrial mop head made of premium quality cotton material , Soft and Super Absorbent. Which not only can quickly absorb the water stains on the floor surface, easily take away the dirt on the floor. Makes your cleaning easier .

✔ 〖Premium Long Handle 〗The handle of the commercial floor mop is thickened design, sturdy and durable. Don't worry about the handle being bent or broken due to pressure during use. The 60 inch long mop allows you to stand upright for cleaning, reducing the strain on your waist.

✔ 〖Suitable for All Surfaces〗 Use this string mop to clean all types of surface areas including home wooden floors, kitchen floors, restaurant floors, bathroom floors, garages, warehouses, offices, decks, tile floors, marble floors, and hardwood.

☛ 〖Easy To Use 〗The heavy duty mop adopts a stable buckle connection, making installation and removal easier. If you got any damaged or indefective cotton mop, contact us and we will take care of it for you immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this mop is good, it is highly absorbent and easy to assemble. It is also long enough for me to mop the floor very conveniently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mop for durable use
reviews.reviewText: The assembly process was incredibly straightforward, a relief given that these products sometimes come with complicated instructions. I had it put together quickly, which is a huge plus when you're balancing numerous tasks. In terms of performance, it's been outstanding. It smoothly sweeps across the floor, effortlessly picking up dirt and spills with minimal effort. The mop's design clearly considers the classroom environment - it's durable yet light, making it simple to navigate around desks and chairs without causing a fuss. It's been effective on various types of messes, from water to the more stubborn stains like juice, and soda, handling everything with ease.I lovr that this mop lets me to devote more attention to my students rather than the messes they leave behind. Additionally, the students seem quite intrigued whenever I use it to quickly deal with a spill - almost as if I've pulled off a magic act! To sum up, if you're in search of a dependable, user-friendly mop for your classroom that delivers on its promises, this one is worth considering. It's simplified my cleaning routine and kept our classroom in pristine condition. Definitely recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fair price for a decent mop
reviews.reviewText: The mop was easy to assemble, and I was impressed with its length. To clean, I simply rinse it in hot water and dry it out in the sun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom was in the best quality you would expect a broom to be in. I will highly recommend this broom to anyone looking for heavy duty cleaning. This is the product worth your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble. Sturdy and pretty mop.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Sturdy and pretty mop. My teen son assembled it. The cleaning lady said it is a sturdy and easy to use mom that is "pretty" too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Full Head
reviews.reviewText: I use this as a dust mop for my hard floors. This is a brilliant product. I also damp mop. The head is VERY FULL. The handle is wonderfully long to reach behind couch. Works amazing to dust base boards, ceilings and more. HIGHLY recommend. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hubby told same quality as what we bought from Home Depot but it only cost half :) we have a toddler girl home, need to mop the floor nearly everyday, this is the old fashion mop but easy to use :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful affordable mop
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought another mop on Amazon it was a total piece of junk. I ended up poking holes in my sheetrock from the ridiculously sharp and pointy edges of the mop holder and the lint sloughed off making me have to vacuum AFTER i mopped lol. A bit counterintuitive if you ask me. This mop is 500% better!!!! There’s no lint, it’s fluffy, it doesn’t tear up my walls and it works brilliantly!!! 5* purchase all day everyday!!!
